title: kumbiTTu vara
sahitya:
kumbiTTu vara vENumE dinamum kumara padamE satamena nambi


anupallavi

  semmAlin maruganai shiva perumAn maghanai lambOdara sOdara lAvaNYa svarUpanai


caraNam    tAvik-kudittengum tangA talai kurangin nanmaiyuLLa manadai tan vayamuL aDakki
Avi kuzhainduruga harahara murugAvena kUvi azhaikkavE nAvaiyEvippazhakki
